summary: In a corporate-controlled future, an ultra-violent sport known as Rollerball represents the world, and one of its powerful athletes is out to defy those who want him out of the game.
cast: James Caan|John Houseman|Maud Adams|John Beck|Moses Gunn|Pamela Hensley|Barbara Trentham|John Normington|Shane Rimmer|Burt Kwouk|Nancy Bleier|Richard LeParmentier|Robert Ito|Ralph Richardson|Craig R. Baxley|Jimmy Berg|Steve Boyum|Miquel Brown|Tony Brubaker|Loftus Burton|Anthony Chinn|Barrie Cookson|Robert Dancel|Sarah Douglas|Dick Enberg|Abi Gouhad|David Griffin|Alan Hamane|Patti Hammond|John Harvey|Andy Ho|Kevin Jewison|Valli Kemp|Eddie Kubo|Robert Lee|Bob Leon|Angus MacInnes|Mac McDonald|Bob Miller|Bob Minor|Byron Morrow|Yasuko Nagazumi|Walter Scott|Alfred Thomas|Burnell Tucker|Danny Wong
title: Rollerball, ¿un futuro próximo?
